mapper.select: SELECT n.seq_notice AS seqNotice, n.seq_doctor AS seqDoctor, -- session seq_member -- d.seq_member AS seqMember, n.seq_animal_hospital AS seqAnimalHospital, n.notice_subject AS noticeSubject, n.notice_content AS noticeContent, date_format(n.notice_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeWriteDate, a.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, date_format(n.notice_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeUpdateDate from notice AS n join animalhospital AS a ON n.seq_animal_hospital = a.seq_animal_hospital JOIN ( SELECT doc.seq_doctor AS seq_doctor, -- ac.seq_member AS seq_member, ac.member_name AS doctor_name FROM doctor AS doc JOIN account AS ac ON doc.seq_member = ac.seq_member ) AS d on n.seq_doctor = d.seq_doctor order by n.notice_update_date DESC

SELECT n.seq_notice AS seqNotice, n.seq_doctor AS seqDoctor, -- session seq_member -- d.seq_member AS seqMember, n.seq_animal_hospital AS seqAnimalHospital, n.notice_subject AS noticeSubject, n.notice_content AS noticeContent, date_format(n.notice_write_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeWriteDate, a.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName, d.doctor_name AS doctorName, date_format(n.notice_update_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS noticeUpdateDate from notice AS n join animalhospital AS a ON n.seq_animal_hospital = a.seq_animal_hospital JOIN ( SELECT doc.seq_doctor AS seq_doctor, -- ac.seq_member AS seq_member, ac.member_name AS doctor_name FROM doctor AS doc JOIN account AS ac ON doc.seq_member = ac.seq_member ) AS d on n.seq_doctor = d.seq_doctor WHERE n.seq_notice = #{seqNotice}

SELECT doc.seq_doctor AS seqDoctor, ah.seq_animal_hospital AS seqAnimalHospital, doc.doctor_name AS doctorName, ah.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName, date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') AS today FROM ( SELECT d.seq_doctor AS seq_doctor, d.seq_animal_hospital AS seq_animal_hospital, ac.member_name AS doctor_name FROM doctor AS d JOIN account AS ac ON d.seq_member = ac.seq_member ) AS doc JOIN animalhospital AS ah ON doc.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital WHERE doc.seq_doctor = #{seqDoctor} AND ah.seq_animal_hospital = #{seqAnimalHospital}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice( seq_doctor, seq_animal_hospital, notice_subject, notice_content, notice_write_date, notice_update_date ) VALUES ( #{seqDoctor}, #{seqAnimalHospital}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeContent}, #{today}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE Notice SET notice_subject = #{noticeSubject}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_update_date = now() WHERE seq_notice = #{seqNotice}
